Try to run temporal on top of  Amazon Keyspaces
Add health check handler for worker service
Support sqlite in production.
Metadata for Timers
Add task queue query
Implement dynamic task queue routing

Support embedded version of the service
Official CockroachDB (CRDB) support
Support last day of month as a recurring schedule option
